<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mask of Allure](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1066)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 186 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 24,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn mask

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This mask appears to be a pool of mirrored, shifting silver adhered to a thin metal plate. When you place it against your face, it melds to the shape of your head. The material is breathable and light, and does not obscure vision. You gain a +2 item bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5), [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6), [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7), and [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks while wearing the mask.

 When you invest the mask, you either increase your Charisma score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever would give you a higher score.

<document level="2" id="action-855" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
